column4: Can someone help me with some regex? I'm trying to write a debuild scritpt that will ignore debian.* but not the debian directory
you mean you want something that returns the files but not the folders?

not exactly, I'm trying to clean up some litian logs by having the debuilder ignore some backup debian directories I keep for backports. I have a main debian that swap out with debian.karmic,debian.jaunty,etc.
